mapper.select: SELECT exam_type_code, exam_type_name FROM exam_type WHERE is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY exam_type_name
SELECT distinct exam_round FROM exam_info WHERE exam_type_id = ( SELECT exam_type_id FROM exam_type WHERE exam_type_code = #{examTypeCode} ) ORDER BY exam_round
mapper.insert:
SELECT seq_exam_info.nextval FROM dual
INSERT INTO exam_info ( exam_id, exam_type_id, exam_round, exam_subject, sessionNo ) VALUES ( #{examId}, #{examTypeId}, #{examRound}, #{examSubject}, #{sessionNo} )

SELECT seq_exam_question.nextval FROM dual
INSERT INTO exam_question ( question_id, exam_id, question_num, question_text, question_image, individualPassage, commonPassage, passage_scope ) VALUES ( #{questionId}, #{examId}, #{questionNum}, #{questionText}, null, #{individualPassage}, #{commonPassage}, #{passageScope} )
INSERT INTO exam_choice ( choice_id, question_id, choice_label, choice_text, choice_image ) VALUES ( seq_exam_choice.nextval, #{questionId}, #{choiceLabel}, #{choiceText}, #{choiceImage} )
mapper.select: SELECT Q.question_id, Q.question_num, Q.question_text, Q.question_image, Q.individualPassage, Q.commonPassage, Q.passage_scope FROM exam_question Q JOIN exam_info I on Q.exam_id = I.exam_id JOIN exam_type T on I.exam_type_id = T.exam_type_id WHERE T.exam_type_code = #{examType} AND I.exam_round = #{examRound} AND I.exam_subject = #{examSubject} ORDER BY Q.question_num asc
SELECT question_id, choice_id, choice_label, choice_text, choice_image FROM exam_choice ORDER BY question_id ASC, choice_label ASC
